New Records: Naseem Shah hit back-to-back sixes to secure the win for Pakistan
Pakistan scored 131 runs in 19.2 overs while chasing 130
Shadab Khan contributed with 36 runs off 26 balls
Rashid Khan and others took key wickets for Afghanistan
Key Match Events: Naseem Shah's crucial sixes in the final overs
Pakistan's chase was decided in the 19th over
The match was a turning point for Pakistan's campaign
Pre-Game Insights: Babar Azam won the toss and decided to bowl first due to dew conditions
Mohammad Nabi expressed confidence in Afghanistan's batting and dew factor strategy
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan's victory booked their place in the final against Sri Lanka
Naseem Shah and Shadab Khan were praised for their performances
The match highlighted the importance of dew conditions in T20 cricket
Miscellaneous Highlights: The dew factor significantly affected the match outcome
Zazai and Gurbaz opened for Afghanistan
The match was played at Sharjah Stadium
Others: Pakistan's playing XI included Babar Azam, Fakhar Zaman, and Shadab Khan
Afghanistan's XI featured Ibrahim Zadran and Mohammad Nabi
